attributes.action: Stop EU education lessons in british schools
attributes.additional_details:
A recent report from EU is calling for all children over the age of 5 to be taught in british schools the benefits of the EU.
   This is politically wrong by the EU when we should be concentrating on the basic education values and not what some would as a brain washing move to stop the rise of the anti EU movement across Europe . We call on the goverment to stop this from happening as the EU as no right to decide how are children should see the EU for all it's good or bad . Let are children have free and open minded view when they grow up
